Room.Name: Leviathan Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are admiring the scenery while casually walking along Leviathan Drive.
Room.LongDescription: On the east side of the road is the spectacular Ashton Falls Resort and Inn, where a number of the more famous visitors to Oceancrest and even a number of high powered officials stay from time to time to get away from the chaos of life. The magnificent resort overlooks the equally impressive Ashton Falls (a waterfall), to which the resort is named after.
